data.subject: ComfyUI-DirGir
data.question: What is the purpose of the ComfyUI-DirGir custom node pack?
data.answer: The ComfyUI-DirGir custom node pack provides utility nodes to get directories right in ComfyUI.

data.subject: ComfyUI-DirGir
data.question: How do I install the ComfyUI-DirGir custom node pack?
data.answer: The custom node pack automatically installs when launched. If installation fails, the Directory Picker will not function properly. Refer to the documentation for instructions on manual installation.

data.subject: ComfyUI-DirGir
data.question: List the nodes available in the ComfyUI-DirGir custom node pack.
data.answer: The custom node pack includes nodes for directory selection, looping, and image fetching.

data.subject: ComfyUI-DirGir/DIR Gir Directory Picker
data.question: How does the 'Select Directory' node work?
data.answer: The 'Select Directory' node opens a file browser to choose a directory. The selected directory is saved and accessible through an output string.

data.subject: ComfyUI-DirGir/DIR Loopy Dir
data.question: Explain the functionality of the 'Loopy Dir' node.
data.answer: The 'Loopy Dir' node automatically loops through files in a directory. It can be used to process files in sequence or perform tasks based on each file.

data.subject: ComfyUI-DirGir/Examples
data.question: Can you provide an example workflow using the ComfyUI-DirGir custom node pack?
data.answer: The provided document includes a simple workflow demonstrating directory selection, looping, and image loading using the custom node pack.

data.subject: ComfyUI-DirGir/Known Issues
data.question: Are there any known issues with the ComfyUI-DirGir custom node pack?
data.answer: The document mentions an issue with directory selection on macOS after the first selection. This issue is not present on Windows.
